title: INtravel
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: LATAM could make US push after big order for new Embraer jets
items.description: LATAM will use its new Embraer E195-E2s to add destinations and boost connectivity across its route map.

items.title: The first Series by Marriott hotels are coming to the U.S. — here's why it's good news
items.description: Marriott's newest brand, Series by Marriott, will make its U.S. debut by converting five lifestyle hotels around the country.

items.title: How my Amex Platinum is helping me navigate Southwest's big changes
items.description: Checked bags no longer fly free on Southwest — but the Amex Platinum airline fee credit is here to help.

items.title: Amex Membership Rewards transfer partners: Redeem your points with airlines and hotels
items.description: Check out this complete guide to maximizing your American Express Membership Rewards points with its transfer partners.

items.title: How and why you might want to book a mileage run
items.description: If you're just shy of hitting an elite status level or want to chase a lucrative promotion, a mileage run might help. Here's what you should know.
